juàn

劵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《集韻》逵眷切，去綫，羣。］

劵字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　劵； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页147第08
【唐韻】渠卷切【集韻】【正韻】逵眷切，?權去聲。【說文】勞也。【徐曰】今俗作倦。【正字通】與契券之券異。券从刀，此从力。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　劵; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 147 to 08
[Tang Yun] Qujuan cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Kwai cut, right to sound. [Said Wen] Lao Ye. [Xu Yue] Today's custom is tired. [Zhengzitong] is different from the contract coupon. The coupons are from the knife, and from this.
